name: Nivel Siete
tag_list: moodle, moodle-partner, totara, totara-partner, questionmark, typo3, articulate, shift, connect, captivate, amvonet
overview: With more than 400.000 final users in Latin America, Nivel Siete provides a complete set of solutions to enable e-learning in the corporate and education sectors. From authoring tools, SaaS for Moodle LMS, to consulting and education portals, Nivel Siete works with organizations to achieve it’s business goals trough human performance improvement.

milestones.description: José Díaz is the new CEO
